input.name: btnColor
input.label: Button Color (Hex number)
input.help-text: Use a Hexadecimal color value for button color. (Example : #4286f4)

input.name: externalUrl
input.label: External URL
input.help-text: Add an URL, points to external web site. Url should contain "https" or "http". For example https://example.com. You can only use either "External URL" or "Link to other page" at time. In case you fill both fields, "External URL" has priority and the button will link to it.

input.name: btnUrl
input.label: Link to other page
input.help-text: From the list above, choose a page that you have already made and want the button points to it. You can only use either "External URL" or "Link to other page" at time. In case you fill both fields, "External URL" has priority and the button will link to it.
